dailyQuotes.quote: Over every mountain there is a path, although it may not be seen from the valley.
dailyQuotes.author: Theodore Roethke

dailyQuotes.quote: Someday is not a day of the week.
dailyQuotes.author: Denise Brennan-Nelson

dailyQuotes.quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
dailyQuotes.author: Steve Jobs

dailyQuotes.quote: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.
dailyQuotes.author: Napoleon Hill

dailyQuotes.quote: Without hustle, talent will only carry you so far.
dailyQuotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

dailyQuotes.quote: You always pass failure on the way to success.
dailyQuotes.author: Mickey Rooney

dailyQuotes.quote: No one is perfect. That’s why pencils have erasers.
dailyQuotes.author: Wolfgang Riebe

dailyQuotes.quote: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
dailyQuotes.author: Chinese Proverb

dailyQuotes.quote: Be not afraid of growing slowly, be afraid only of standing still.
dailyQuotes.author: Chinese Proverb

dailyQuotes.quote: Better a diamond with a flaw than a pebble without one.
dailyQuotes.author: Chinese Proverb

dailyQuotes.quote: A closed mind is like a closed book; just a block of wood.
dailyQuotes.author: Chinese Proverb

dailyQuotes.quote: Better to light a candle than to curse the darkness.
dailyQuotes.author: Chinese Proverb

dailyQuotes.quote: He who cheats the earth will be cheated by the earth.
dailyQuotes.author: Chinese Proverb

dailyQuotes.quote: Nobody can make you feel inferior without your permission.
dailyQuotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

dailyQuotes.quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
dailyQuotes.author: Mark Twain

dailyQuotes.quote: Educating the mind without educating the heart is no education at all.
dailyQuotes.author: Aristotle

dailyQuotes.quote: In the end, it’s not the years in your life that count. It’s the life in your years.
dailyQuotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

dailyQuotes.quote: Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.
dailyQuotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

dailyQuotes.quote: Life is ten percent what happens to you and ninety percent how you respond to it.
dailyQuotes.author: Lou Holtz

dailyQuotes.quote: The only disability in life is a bad attitude.
dailyQuotes.author: Scott Hamilton

dailyQuotes.quote: There is more to life than increasing its speed.
dailyQuotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

dailyQuotes.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
dailyQuotes.author: Confucius

dailyQuotes.quote: Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile.
dailyQuotes.author: Albert Einstein

dailyQuotes.quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
dailyQuotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

dailyQuotes.quote: Each person must live their life as a model for others.
dailyQuotes.author: Rosa Parks

dailyQuotes.quote: Life is not about how fast you run or how high you climb, but how well you bounce.
dailyQuotes.author: Vivian Komori

dailyQuotes.quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
dailyQuotes.author: Buddha

dailyQuotes.quote: Don't find fault. Find a remedy.
dailyQuotes.author: Henry Ford

dailyQuotes.quote: Science without religion is lame, religion without science is blind.
dailyQuotes.author: Albert Einstein

dailyQuotes.quote: Winning is fun, but those moments that you can touch someone’s life in a very positive way are better.
dailyQuotes.author: Tim Howard

areas.noNearbyAreasFound: Nothing yet. Start the conversation by posting from the Map or increase the Awareness Radius to discover nearby content.
areas.noSocialAreasFound: You have not yet activated any moments/spaces. Explore the world, and active areas will start to appear in this view.
areas.noHireAreasFound: No freelancer postings found in your area. Check back soon to find local freelancers in range of your location.
areas.noEventsAreasFound: No current or upcoming events found. Grow your connections to increase visibility and receive invites to exclusive events.

bookmarked.noSocialBookmarksFound: No bookmarks to display. Mark content as favorited by clicking the bookmark icon on a post.
bookmarked.noHireBookmarksFound: No bookmarks to display. Bookmark a freelancer by clicking the bookmark icon on a listing.
bookmarked.noEventsBookmarksFound: No bookmarks to display. Bookmark an event by clicking the bookmark icon on an invite.

createForum.noForumsMessage: No forums are currently active. Click 'Create Forum' to start a new one.

emailVerification.failedMessage: Failed to verify your e-mail. Invalid verification code.
emailVerification.failedMessageExpired: Failed to verify your e-mail. Verification code has expired.
emailVerification.failedMessageAlreadyVerified: Your e-mail is already verified. Log in to continue.
emailVerification.failedMessageVerificationResent: A new verification code has been sent to {email}.
emailVerification.failedMessageUserNotFound: No user found. Try a different e-mail or create an account to continue.
emailVerification.successVerifiedMessage: Your account has been verified. Log in to continue.

forgotPassword.instructions: Enter your account e-mail below, and we'll send you a temporary password.

login.pageSubtitle: Sign in to Therr to see what you missed

userAlerts.registerSuccess: Registration success! Check your e-mail for verification.

nearby.locationDescription1: See posts from nearby users in the local community where you currently are.
nearby.locationDescription2: Use the awareness and influence sliders to control content distance and your own visibility.
nearby.locationDescription3: Please enable location services to activate this feature.

notifications.noNotifications: You have no notifications at this time

areaAlerts.walkCloser: Walk closer to activate this moment/space

register.pageSubtitle: Create a profile and see what you are missing
register.passwordRequirements1: Contains a mixture of letters and numbers

userProfile.connectionSent: You connection request is on the way!

subtitles.createConnection: Send a connection request or invite someone to join Therr!
subtitles.whoInviteDisclaimer: Choose who and how you would like to invite.

labels.feedbackPlaceholder: Tell us what you love or hate about the app...

userProfile.siteDescription1: Welcome to Therr app. As we gather feedback and develop new features, let us know how we can improve the experience.
userProfile.siteDescription3: Share a moment with your connections on the map or send a quick DM. Moments are proximity activated and entirely customizable.
userProfile.siteDescription4: Then, check your feed for moments posted by others in the spaces you travel to. Get to know the local culture by searching content that was shared nearby (recently or historically), and filter your interests with hashtags, keywords, etc.
userProfile.noActiveConnections: There are currently no active connections in your network
userProfile.requestRecommendation: Send a request to make connections and build a network

messages.error: An error occured while trying to send your feedback. Please try again later.
messages.success: Your feedback has been received. Thank you!

confirmModal.blockUser: Are you sure you want to block {userName}?
confirmModal.reportUser: Are you sure you want to report {userName}?
confirmModal.unconnect: Remove connection with {userName}? (You will no longer be able to activate new content from this user)

touringModal.createAMoment: Curate content on the go. 'Moments' are only available when a user in your network discovers them. Enable location and press the plus icon. Set the geo-radius for activation and customize each moment to your heart's desire!
touringModal.claimYourSpaces: Claim a limited # of spaces. Content is public, and nobody can claim overlapping spaces. Use your space to notify users and share local content.
touringModal.exploreTheWorld: Seek out 'moments' that peak your interests. Check the map for Insights and plan your travels accordingly. Find and post 'Gigs', schedule 'Events', and connect with the community. Some of these features are unlocked only after reaching certain milestones.

accessFineLocation.title: Therr Mobile
accessFineLocation.message: Allow Therr to acces this device's location?

locationGps.description1: This app wants to change your device settings: Use GPS, Wi-Fi, and cell network for location
locationGps.description2: This app collects location data in the background to enable content discovery by proximity and to send related notifications. Location is required in the foreground to enable content posting

validations.mobilePhoneNumber: Input must be a valid, international mobile number beginning with '+'
